column1: Column 1

We really enjoyed our stay here. The villa where we stayed was well maintained. The staff was friendly and helpful especially the young lady at the reception when we checked in and checked out. We couldn’t get her name. She’s exceptional. Once again thank you for an amazing stay. We’ll come back :)

Very comfortable, no plan to stay long once booking this place, yet once arrived, i’m surprised by this place with the price i got, unbelievable! and of course i extend another night here, but 2 nights is not enough so i again extend one more night. The staffs are awesome, so kind and helpful as good as the breakfast. Definitely will come back someday, what a recommended place!
Stay always here after dirt bike ride with Bali Dirt Bike Adventures. Room was good, staff were friendly.

large clean rooms with a waterpark for the children. Mr Wayan is an incredible host and all the staff were kind and friendly. We will be returning here as it really was a great stay for the whole family
Andrea and his colleague were simply awesome and smiling.. best scenic views
No wifi  I am sadness
Great place with reasonable rate. Reccomended for all travellers

Great accommodation calm and relaxing place with rice field view surrounded, also there a mini waterpark,very clean and friendly staff,reasonable price 
Good restaurant and good service
Good place. Very excited with the staff support. The breakfast so delicious
But No Wifi.. Wifi is down 😥
Been on vacation with family in this village. Very memorable because the architect is very ethnic with a private pool in the backyard
It’s a bit far from everywhere no grab or gojek’s driver here but it is really value for money u got free breakfast too even tho the menu is same everyday n just coffee & water

Overall is good, the location, facilities, and the breakfast. 
All the staff was very helpful. I'd to recommend this villas to others. 
Thank you for your kind assistance during stay
Nice accomodation for family, breakfast need to improve
Nice accomodatin in the middle of rice field,nice water park
Nice rice view, breakfast need to improve
Very love this place.

The villa is spacious and beds are comfortable. The overall cleanliness can do better. Good value for money. The waterpark is a little rundown but kept the kids busy. The restaurant have a nice rice paddy view and the food is alright.

Get unforgetable experience when our booked room was un-available !!! 
Location : a bit away from city
Signage : need improvement
Cleanliness : fair
Space : ok
Food : ok, resto available at 9am
Pool : ok
Shower : need improvement

Cheap enough but the room stank or damp and you can see it on the walls. Not a good area if you are a tourist. Loads of ants and other critters get into rooms easily if that bothers you. The retaraunt area is ok and the "water park" (a pool with some chutes) is popular with locals. Feels quite safe but very flimsy doors and locks to villas and rooms
We booked for nine days and left after one day. The place is very remote. Lots of insects and reptiles.

stayed for 5 nights, after planning just 3 at first. Perfect getaway in the countryside with beach close by and small town in walking distance. Very friendly and hospitable staff for economical prices. The rooms/villas quite new and well designed. I was doing yoga all days (yoga camp 10 minutes drive where hotel staff can take you to) but also a great location for walks, motorbike day tours, reading (or tv + internet, both good). small but very cool pool as well.  Will be back!

This is a classic asian budget resort, which means it is patchy! The good things are great, the not great are pretty poor!
The villas are clean with comfy beds, but smell strongly of  moth balls, which isn’t great. The kitchen is totally useless it just has a sink and fridge. The kettle was good.
There is no ventilation in the bathrooms and the hot water lasts about 2 mins, but again, comfy beds and for a family of five it’s great to have space.
The pool area is so fun but the slides are incredibly dangerous. The red one causes the rider to bash their head on the way down. Our advice is start the slide at the halfway point to avoid. We saw screws literally drop out of the yellow slide. Not ideal!
Pool is fun though. 
Mr Wayan at the restaurant is an absolute legend, the best sort of staff ever, he could teach the rest some lessons. He couldn’t do enough to help, and the breakfast is substantial and tasty. 
So, total mixed bag!

The staff were so friendly, gave us free rides to ATM. Which are far, so make sure you bring enough money with you. The food at the restaurant was very good and cheap. The breakfast was great! The beds were super comfy. We would recommend this place to anyone. We are sad we didn’t get to stay longer!! Christna(manager), Darma(driver) and Waran( restaurant manager) all went above and beyond with us and our children.

the place is very quiet amazing veiw on the rice terrace . the stuff were very cooperative and helpful . they gave my kids bikes to ride it for free from the first day we arrived and the supervisor of the place took us in his car to see the nearby amazing waterfall for free . my family enjoyed their stay there and want to come back again.
Stayed for a week and for the second time in the hotel.  Great atmosphere, economical and friendly
A real haven of peace! Very comfortable and clean accommodation. A charming and attentive staff. I will definitely come back!

Pool & on site restaurant was fantastic.
Unfortunately, the water slides are not very well designed. Approx. one hour drive to anywhere of interest but great if you just want to hang by the pool and eat cheaply.
If you wanna get away from noisy life and enjoy the nature you have to go there
The villa was nice, clean, spacious, calm, peaceful, friendly staff and value for money.

Very good.. very recommended..
All satisfying..
This hotel not bad for transit. Not bad if u searching for peacefull. But dont expect to much u got what u pay
most rooms have no view, nice pool for kids, in the middle of nowhere, breakfast subpar.
hotel transit

Our family had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the facilities very much. The staff was wonderful and the food at the restaurant was very good. The location is a bit out of the way, so I would definitely recommend getting a rental car for your stay.
Valueable and reasonable price
location near gilimanuk harbour

We had a fantastic stay in a three-bedroom villa. Our son loved the water park, we all enjoyed the private pool at our villa, and the staff was incredible. The staff really made sure our stay was great. The location is a bit out of the way because of traffic, but well worth it. Highly recommended!

If you are looking for something away from the beaten track then this is one to look at. Beautiful surrounds, lovely restaurant and helpful staff. 
Keep in mind this is a jungle setting so Hornets are around!
Bon ben cet hotel etait vraiment magnifique, suite tres spacieuse, lit tres tres confortable
Hier war alles sehr stimmig, leider noch keinen Pool aber mitten im Reisfeld ... sehr empfehlenswert als Durchgangshotel
Harga worth it & Fasilitas cukup memadai. Perlu maintenance yg rutin.
Recommend banget dah utk tempat menginap, fasilitas oke, terutama kolam renang nya (nyenengin banget utk anak2), utk harga kamar aman dikantong, pokoknya nginap di Umadhatu gak pernah bosen.
Fasilatas cocok utk pergi rame2
kami menginap 2 malam disini kami puas staff nya baik ramah km bgs harga murah
Villanya menyenangkan apalagi buat tidur, cuma kekurangannya tdk ada capstok buat gantung handuk sm jemuran...overall mantap
sangat direkomendasikan, penginapan villa kecil, cukup bersih, pemandangan bagus, dan promo yang sangat murah sekali
Mantap dengan dpt harga yg murah 3 kamar😍
Villa bagus dgn harga murah, kolam renang yang menyenangkan bagi anak-anak.
Tempatnya sungguh bagus pas dapat harga yg murah.

Luar biasa Agoda.... 
Saya bs dapat harga yg super hemat di Amadhatu Village

Waaooww... baru kali ini saya dapat harga terbaik dari Agoda... murah banget.. 
Thanks Agoda.. sering 2 ya...
Villa yang sangat cocok untuk keluarga, tempat yang bersih dan masih asri lain kali pasti kita berkunjung kembali
fasilitas kolam, waterpark, sepeda, air panas dingin mantap

Lokasi yang nyaman dan asri di tepi sawah. Udara sejuk dan segar, cocok jalan jalan sore setelah keliling Bali. Restoran dengan rasa makanan yang enak, cocok ngopi + pisang goreng di malam hari. Sangat indah dan berkesan.
Tempat yg tenang dan nyaman untuk liburan bersama keluarga dan anak kecil.. jauh dari kesibukan kota besar..
Harga sangat terjangkai dan sangat memuaskan
Lokasi strategis, parkir mudah dan aman, kamar luar biasa, pelayanan bagus, harga murah tapi berkualitas, plus sarapan juga nikmat, pokoknya pengalaman yg luar 👍👍
Enaknya disini mobil langsung depan kamar... Tempat nyaman dan bersih

Staff sangat ramah dan sigap.. kolam renang bersih.. 
Pilihan sarapan nasi goreng dan mie goreng
Seluruh villa dibersihkan setiap hari
👍
private pool bersih, kamar nyaman, kamar mandi luas, cocok untuk suasana sepi dan hening.
Tempatnya nyaman, homey banget, staff nya ramah. Anak saya sampai minta nginep lagi disitu
Keren, cuma satu kekurangan nya kapasitas water heater nya perlu di tambah. Karena ketika mandi giliran harus menunggu air panas nya untuk memanaskan kembali.
Sangat menyenangkan untuk menginap disini kamarnya luas aemua staff nya ramah. Tks
Staff sangat ramah lingkungan yg nyaman
Salah satu villa terbaik dengan harga yg murah di tabanan
Bagus pasti balik lagi
Tempatnya enak fasilitas ok

Fasilitas  villa bagus dan lengkap
Hanya taman di dalem villa tidak terawat 
Staf ramah dan pelayanan cukup baik
Harga cukup reasonable mengingat lokasi nya 
Makanan biasa aja
 Trimakasih
Pokoknya siip. Pagi dapat makan malam juga dapat makan. Nasi campurnya enak. Pokoknya top
Serasa Punya Rumah sendiri di Bali

Secara keseluruhan tempat ini samgat bagus baik dari sisi pelayanan dan kebersihan. Proses check in dan check out yang cepat, staff yang ramah, dan pelayanan yang tepat waktu. Hanya saja ada beberapa hal yang masih kurang yaitu masih ditemukan adanya sedikit sarang laba-laba di kamar, wifi yang b

Kamar cukup utk 3org, cocok utk keluarga, apalagi kl bawa krucil.. hanya saja ac di salah 1 kamar nggak dingin & banyak serangga masuk dr taman belakang. Kasur & bantalnya nyaman. Kebersihan kamar mandi cukup.
Cocok untuk yang ingin menikmati waktu di tempat keramaian dan Q-Time Untuk Keluarga

Tempatnya asri dan cukup tenang, asyik utk jogging tetapi kamar kurang bersih dilihat dari tempat tidur yg masih ada debu, bedcover yg masih ada banyak noda, plafon ada bagian bekas bocor, tisu toilet yg lupa diisi (setelah dikomunikasikan diisi), password dan username wifi tdk langsung disampaikan saat check-in (harus tanya dulu, baru diinfo), waktu check-out jg tdk diinformasikan kecuali ditanyakan dulu. Untuk breakfast cukup, bisa room service tanpa dicharge.
Saya tidak akan kembali kesana lagi.kotor,air shower kecil, barang saya tertinggal hilang

Cukup unik juga  sptnya awal usahanya  berawal dari komplek perumahan yg dialih fungsikan menjadi Villa2, cukup bagus memang dan lokasi yg menunjang.
Menu sarapan yg kurang variatif
Overall semuanya okey 👍
Untuk pasangan sih mnrt ku cocok, tapi untuk bawa anak.. kurang. Tempatnya seperti rumah jadul, jadi kesannya begitulah ya... makanan kurang, jarak jauh bgt..
Keren dengan harga yg terjangkau, fasilitas oke meski ada bbrp hal yg kurang tapi worth it lah
Jarak ke Gilimanuk hanya 2jam. Tempat luas, tenang.
Tempat nyaman untuk melepas lelah setelah perjalanan panjang dari Jawa ke Bali. Suasananya tenang dengan konsep ruang makan terbuka menambah kenikmatan waktu santai bersama keluarga.
Salah satu lokasi pilihan saya kalau ingin menikmati ketenangan dan keasrian Bali ya disinilah ....... Cobain Dech
keren
Fasilitas OK, syg check in jm 1 mlm
dapat bangunan baru... luas dan nyaman

Saya nginep disini untuk transit perjalanan menuju Kuta, masuk malam agak serem gelap. Modelnyanya Villa, jadi kalo ambil kamar mungkin satu 1 villa sama tamu lain, kalo kebetulan kamar sebelah ngga ada yg pesen enak jadi peen kamar dapet villa, bersih luas dan bagus. Rekomended

Ini yg kedua kali kami menginap di sini, namun untuk kamar kali ini kotor sekali dengan dinding kamar yg sangat lembab di kamar A5 , kolam cukup besar, namun fasilitas permainan khususnya seluncuran sangat menyeramkan, sangat berbahaya , ada baut yg terlepas dan dapat terhantuk kepala di terowongan, benar2 tidak diperhitungkan.
Kolam renang disukai anak2, makanan rest enak

Tempatnya enak, bagus, harga terjangkau, bersih, staff jg ramah..
Cuman memang jauh ke tempat wisata, menu breakfast jg kuranh variasi..
Pas sy nginep, air di villa sy kurang lancar deh dan line telp ke lobby nya mati jd susah mau complain langsung, lebih ditingkatkan lg service nya yah..
Kamar yg luas dan suasana yg tenang...air panas yang mati tidak berfungsi.
Lokasi di tabanan, tempat tenang, lokasi sekitar hijau dan nyaman, sarapan hanya ada nasi goreng dan mie goreng, rasa lumayan.

kami menginap semalam di A12 ,  tempat nya sangat bersih, rapi dan menyenangkan. Lokasi nya cocok untuk tempat beristirahat dan bersantai. staff sangat ramah. Terima kasih untuk Bpk Geda Eka dan bpk Wayan.... semoga bisa bertemu kembali tahun depan.
عبارة عن قرية فندقية جميلة لكن بعيدة عن الخدمات والمرافق والمصايف .. غير مناسب للعائلات خصوصا مع الأطفال بسبب عدم توفر المواصلات بسهولة .. إذا كنت تملك سيارة فهو ممتاز وهاديء .. لكنه موحش في الليل

Хороший, отель , место , снимали коттедж с бассейном. Посуды на кухне нет, хотя кухня большая. Ресторан не имеет отношение к отелю, еда ужасная, детям есть нечего. Ехать в нормальный магазин 30 мин.вода в бассейне общественном грязная. Персонал дружественный. Но с детьми тут сложно.
Нестабильный интернет, ужасная еда, персонал не умеет убирать с первого раза, постоянно нужно им пальцем тыкать, где нужно убрать

Vilky jsou prostorné,  Resort jen rok starý, ale zacina místy plesnivet.  Oddělení wc a sprchy od spací části jen zavesem neni moc promyšlené.
Vyborne snidane a skvely, komunikativni a  zcestovaly clobek v kuchyni, ktery je pripraveny pomoci s cimkoliv se na nej obratite.
Tempatnya enak banget ga nyesel deh pkoknya👌
Tempatnya nyaman dan adem
